attributes.action: Reduce global warming, so Britian does not experience an ice age within 20 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the ice at the north pole melts, fresh water will be released in to the sea neer the gulf stream at the place where the water is dragged down to the bottom by salt content. If the ice caps melt and fresh water is released, then the water will not sink and cool, and the sea convayor belt will cease to function, meaning that the gulf stream will no longer function, meaning that Britian will be thrown into an ice age. Unless you like your drinks extreamly cold, i urge you to presure the goverment into sorting this problem out NOW!!
